full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 Form approved. Budget Busmu No. 43-R343. No. AFFIDAVIT OF WITNESS IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF MARIA JUANA ALVARENGA File No. ALIEN REG. NO. A FOIA (b)(6) AFFIDAVIT MARIA ESTHER ALVARENGA DE CASAS , occupation OPERATOR residing at 3951 DWIGGINS ST., LOS ANGELES, CA 90063 (Number and street) (City or town) (State) (ZIP Code) being duly sworn, deposes and says that (s)he XXX a citizen of the United States of America; that is not (s)he has personally known and has been acquainted in the United States with MARIA JUANA ALVARENGA , the applicant above mentioned; his that to her personal knowledge the applicant has resided in the United States as follows: LOS ANGELES, CA from 09/18/83 to PRESENT (City. town, and $ 1040) (Health) (Year) (Month) (Year) from to (City, town, and State) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) from to (City. town. and Stass) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) from to (City. town. and State) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) his that (s)he is able to determine the date of the beginning of her | acquaintance with the applicant in the United-States from the following (act(s): THE APPLICANT IS MY MOTHER AND SHE HAS RESIDED IN MY HOME SINCE HER ARRIVAL TO THIS COUNTRY. I AM THE PERSON WHO PROVIDES FOR HER SUPPQRT SINCE HER ARRIVAL TO THIS COUNTRY. that (s)he has personal knowledge that the applicant is a person of good moral character, and that the longest period during the residence described in which (s)h has not seen the applicant is (Years) (Months) OFFICIAL SEAL BERTHA SANDRA HORTA NOTARY DUE. : AL'FORNIA Maria bitter alvaienga de Cara LOS ANGELES COUNTY My comm. expires DEC 8, 1991 (Signature of witness) MARIA ESTHER ALVARENGA DE CASAS Subscribed and sworn to before me by the above-named witness at LOS ANGELES, CA this 17th day of AUGUST 19 91 Bertha Sandra Norta Form 8-488 (Signature of attentor) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immugration and Naturalisation Source BERTHA SANDRA HORTA, NOTARY PUBLIC (Rev. 80-8-78)N (Title or escossor)
